10 Q. Did she send you an email or a text to that
11 effect?
12 A. I don't recall.
13 Q. Did anyone else at Lighthouse communicate a
14 complaint about Shift4's communications with
15 CardConnect other than this phone call that you had
16 with Ms. Renzulli-Grubbs?
17 A. Oh, yeah, absolutely. So the board, the
18 directors communicated to me that they were not
19 supportive of any actions or interests that my
20 brother and I had in terms of CardConnect. They
21 wanted us to eliminate the prospect of going down
22 that path.
23 Q. And when did you get that communication?
24 A. So that, that would have occurred during the, our
25 Q1 board meeting.
